Classes/ZitiUrlProtocol.html#/c:@M@CZiti.name: register(_:_:)
Classes/ZitiUrlProtocol.html#/c:@M@CZiti.abstract: Registers this protocol via URLProtocol.registerClass and subscribes for service intercept updates from Ziti.

Classes/ZitiUrlProtocol.html#/c:@M@CZiti.name: canInit(with:)
Classes/ZitiUrlProtocol.html#/c:@M@CZiti.abstract: Determines whether Ziti is configured to handle the specified request.

Classes/ZitiUrlProtocol.html#/c:@M@CZiti.name: canonicalRequest(for:)
Classes/ZitiUrlProtocol.html#/c:@M@CZiti.abstract: Returns a canonical version of the specified request.

Classes/ZitiKeychain.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.name: extractRootCa(_:)
Classes/ZitiKeychain.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.abstract: Extract the Root CA certificate from the provided pool

Classes/ZitiKeychain.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.name: addCaPool(_:)
Classes/ZitiKeychain.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.abstract: Add the provided Root CA pool to the keychain

Classes/ZitiKeychain.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.name: evalTrustForCertificates(_:_:_:)
Classes/ZitiKeychain.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.abstract: Evaluates a trust object asynchronously on the specified dispatch queue.

Classes/ZitiKeychain.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.name: extractCerts(_:)
Classes/ZitiKeychain.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.abstract: Extract certificates from a PEM-formatted CA pool and return an array of SecCertificate objects

Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.name: ztAPI
Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.abstract: scheme, host, and port used to communicate with Ziti controller

Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.name: name
Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.abstract: name assocaited with this identity in Ziti.

Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.name: ca
Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.abstract: CA pool verified as part of enrollment that can be used to establish trust with of the Ziti controller

Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.name: init(id:ztAPI:name:ca:)
Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.abstract: Initialize a ZitiIdentity given the provided identity infomation

Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.name: save(_:)
Classes/ZitiIdentity.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.abstract: Save this object to a JSON file

Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse/.name: key
Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse/.abstract: locally generated private key used for generating CSR as part of enrollmen

Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse/.name: cert
Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse/.abstract: signed certificate created as part of CSR process

Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse/.name: ca
Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse/.abstract: root certificates for trusting the Ziti Controller

Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse..name: ztAPI
Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse..abstract: URL of controller returned on successful enrollment attempt

Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse..name: EnrollmentResponse
Classes/ZitiEnroller/EnrollmentResponse..abstract: Class representing response to successful enrollment attempt

Classes/ZitiEnroller.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.name: EnrollmentCallback
Classes/ZitiEnroller.html#/s:5CZiti12Zit.abstract: Type used for escaping callback closure called following an enrollment attempt

Classes/ZitiEnroller.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.name: enroll(privatePem:cb:)
Classes/ZitiEnroller.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.abstract: Enroll a Ziti identity using a JWT file

Classes/ZitiEnroller.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.name: getSubj()
Classes/ZitiEnroller.html#/c:@M@CZiti@ob.abstract: Extract the sub (id) field from HWT file

Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC12InitC.name: InitCallback
Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC12InitC.abstract: Type used for escaping closure called follwing initialize of Ziti connectivity

Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC15Servi.name: ServiceCallback
Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC15Servi.abstract: Type used for closure called when changes to services are detected or a call to serviceAvailable(_:_:) is made

Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC15Perfo.name: PerformCallback
Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC15Perfo.abstract: Type used for closure called for an operation to be performed on the loop

Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.name: init(fromFile:)
Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.abstract: Initialize Ziti with a ZitiIdentity stored in a JSON file.

Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.name: forget()
Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.abstract: Remove keys and certificates created during enroll() from the keychain

Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC18Enrol.name: EnrollmentCallback
Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC18Enrol.abstract: Type used for escaping closure called following an enrollment attempt

Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.name: enroll(_:_:)
Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.abstract: Enroll a Ziti identity using a JWT file

Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.name: run(_:)
Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.abstract: Execute a permanant loop processing data from all attached sources (including Ziti)

Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.name: runAsync(_:)
Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.abstract: Create a new thread for run(_:) and return

Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.name: shutdown()
Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.abstract: Shutdown the Ziti processing started via run(_:). This will cause the loop to exit once all scheduled activity on the loop completes

Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC14getCS.name: getCSDKVersion()
Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC14getCS.abstract: Get the version of the wrapped Ziti C SDK

Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC20getCo.name: getControllerVersion()
Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC20getCo.abstract: Get the version of the connected controller

Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.name: perform(_:)
Classes/Ziti.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)Zi.abstract: Perform an operation in the context of the Ziti run loop, potentially not until the next iteration of the loop

Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC23regis.name: registerServiceCallback(_:)
Classes/Ziti.html#/s:5CZiti4ZitiC23regis.abstract: Register a closure to be called when services are added, changed, or deletes

Classes/Ziti.html.name: Ziti
Classes/Ziti.html.abstract: This is the main entry point for interacting with Ziti, and provides a Swift-friendly way to access the Ziti C SDK

Classes/ZitiConnection.html.name: ZitiConnection
Classes/ZitiConnection.html.abstract: Create ZitiConnections from an instance of Ziti and use to commuicate with services over a Ziti network

Classes/ZitiEnroller.html.name: ZitiEnroller
Classes/ZitiEnroller.html.abstract: Class that enroll an identity with Ziti controller using a one-time JWT file

Classes.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)ZitiErr.name: ZitiError
Classes.html#/c:@M@CZiti@objc(cs)ZitiErr.abstract: Class used for passing information about error conditions encountered while using Ziti

Classes/ZitiKeychain.html.name: ZitiKeychain
Classes/ZitiKeychain.html.abstract: This class manages access to the Keychain, creating and storing keys and certificates needed to access a Ziti network.

Classes/ZitiUrlProtocol.html.name: ZitiUrlProtocol
Classes/ZitiUrlProtocol.html.abstract: URLProtocol that intercepts HTTP and HTTPS URL requests and routes them over the Ziti overlay as configured in your Ziti controller.
